::Magmatron::

    He walked into his office, and hoped Cygnar would follow=
, he had noticed something nobody else had noticed. He would make a good so=
ilder, with the proper mentor.
    A map was showing all bases and if there=
 were any weapons fire at them. There was one base that seemed to have some=
, but his maps hadn't been updated, so it could have stopped. Magmatron rel=
ized he had only one alliance going, that with the Alliance, and he needed =
more.
    "Dachande! Battera!" He called into his comm, as they were the on=
ly units in the field. "I wish for Battera to return to the base, and Dacha=
nde, you will not be accompanying her. You are to go to these cordinates. C=
loak, because there could be fighting, offer a treaty to them, and ask if t=
here leaders would like to meet with me."
    The comm went silent. Magmatr=
on did not expect a 'yes, sir' or anything like that, he expected that the =
next time he heard from Dachande that it would be of a treaty between these=
 bots.
